column2: Island Velothi is a unique blend of traditional Velothi practices, such as those followed by the Ashlanders of Vvardenfell, the Men-of-Keptu-quey's Morihaus worship, and veneration for the Selflessness of Melting Water. Their pantheon consists of the Edri: Azura, Boethia, Mephala, Kyna, and Oua; who serve as their gods; The Idri: Daga, Mola, Malka, and Sheogora; Of course, all of these are commonly known Daedric Princes. And finally, the Mori: Mora, Velotta, and Shezza. The demigods, all of which are believed to reincarnate.
